info leak.title: Server banner disclosure
info leak.description: Check for verbose Server and X-Powered-By headers that reveal software versions.

info leak.title: Robots.txt secrets
info leak.description: Review robots.txt for disallowed entries that may expose sensitive directories.

default files.title: Admin console discovery
default files.description: Probe for default admin panels and dashboards left accessible.

default files.title: Legacy CGI scripts
default files.description: Check for leftover CGI scripts such as /cgi-bin/test that leak system info.

headers.title: Missing security headers
headers.description: Verify presence of CSP, HSTS, and X-Frame-Options defensive headers.

headers.title: ETag fingerprinting
headers.description: Inspect ETag responses that may disclose inode values or deployment details.
